summary: The czar of Russia has died and a power vacuum has developed. This period in the late 16th and early 17th century has been called "The Time of Troubles." There are many impostors who claim ... See full summary »
cast: Pyotr Kislov|Michal Zebrowski|Artur Smolyaninov|Violetta Davydovskaya|Aleksandr Baluev|Marat Basharov|Ramón Langa|Sergey Safronov|Mikhail Porechenkov|Aleksandr Samoylenko|Valeriy Zolotukhin|Filipp Korshunov|Dmitriy Mukhamadeev|Daniil Spivakovskiy|Dmitriy Ulyanov|Sergey Vlasov|Marat Garipov|Viktor Shamirov|Andrey Golubev|Lyubov Lvova
title: 1612: Khroniki smutnogo vremeni
